mapper.insert: INSERT INTO venues (venue_name, address, description, total_capacity, contact, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{venueName}, #{address}, #{description}, #{totalCapacity}, #{contact}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE venues SET venue_name = #{venueName}, address = #{address}, description = #{description}, total_capacity = #{totalCapacity}, contact = #{contact}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE venue_id = #{venueId}
mapper.select: SELECT mt10id, fcltynm, sidonm, gugunnm, mt13cnt, fcltychartr FROM venues WHERE sidonm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area}, '%') ORDER BY fcltynm
SELECT DISTINCT sidonm FROM venues WHERE sidonm IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sidonm
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM venues WHERE venue_id = #{id}
